remarks: Closure of the inner product operation in a pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipcl.f $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
ipcl $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A ., B ) e. K ) $.
